amendatorysection.catchline: Infraction; citation issued in lieu of arrest; exception.
amendatorysection.para: Except as provided in section 29-427, for any offense classified as an infraction, a citation shall be issued in lieu of arrest or continued custody pursuant to sections 29-422 to 29-429.
